document.full_text: on the flight home, "with a shirt from each university stowed safely beneath the seat in front of me,'' the author, a high school senior from colorado, "couldn't help but love both schools even more." so how to decide?
document.title: undecided after 36 sleepless hours
lines_and_colors: on the flight home, "with a shirt from each university stowed safely beneath the seat in front of me,'' the author, a high school senior from colorado, "couldn't help but love both schools even more." so how to decide?
